bike.frame_model: S-Works Stumpjumper Carbon HT SS 29er Frame
bike.description: FACT 10M carbon, 29" geometry, 1.5 - 1/8" tapered HT, horizontal single-speed specific dropouts, adj. caliper mount

components.description: Custom SBC/RockShox Reba S29 Carbon, 90mm travel,  One-piece tapered carbon crown/steeer tube, Rockshox Reba Team lower, titanium motion control damper, L/O w/floodgate adjust.
Custom Shimano BB-91, OS, press-in bearing
36.9mm clamp, one bolt for carbon frame/post
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
